```{r}
library(sf)
library(sfnetworks)
library(maptools)
```

```{r}
Indy_Streets <- st_read("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/fa9ec663cf25407a9b7645ff14334a7f_13.geojson")
```

```{r}
Indy_Streets <- Indy_Streets %>%
    st_transform("+proj=tmerc +lat_0=39.3 +lon_0=-86.15 +k=1.000031 +x_0=240000 +y_0=36000 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_defs")

Indy_Streets
```

```{r}
crs_7327 <- st_crs(7327)

crs_7327$proj4string
```


```{r}
Indy_Streets.sp <- as_Spatial(Indy_Streets)

Indy_Streets.sp
```

```{r}
Indy_Streets.linnet <- as.linnet.SpatialLines(Indy_Streets.sp)
```
